content: 8041-456 jumper pattern spanish english french german italian dutch 1 pattern pdf danish 2 --------------- it is worked in the round from top down on circular needles and is seamless it is started at the neck-line working with right side facing distributing the increases throughout the depth of the yoke as far as the sleeves the sleeve stitches are then left on hold and then brought back into the work later **sizes / measurements** -a m -b l -c xl -d xxl *finished bust circumference * \ a 100 cm b 110 cm c 118 cm d 128 cm \ a 39 3/8 b 43 1/4 c 46 1/2 d 50 3/8 svarende til str -a 36-38 -b 40-42 -c 44-46 -d 48-50 grössen a 36-38 b 40-42 c 44-46 d 48-50 uk size a 8-10 b 12-14 c 16-18 d 20-22 us size a 4-6 b 8-10 c 12-14 d 16-18 tallas / tailles / maten a 38-40 b 42-44 c 46-48 d 50-52 taglie a 42-44 b 46-48 c 50-52 d 54-56 **material** katia concept bellino col 205 - red-lemon yellow-green-blue 2 balls for all sizes needles and notions 3mm/us size 3 circular needles with 40 60 and 80 cm 16 24 and 32 cables 8 stitch markers 1 https //www katia com/en/tools/descarga-modelo/ revista=8041&numero=456&letra=&lng=es-en-fr-de-it-nl 2 https //www katia com/en/tools/descarga-modelo/ revista=8041&numero=456&letra=&lng=da
